definition: A significant service disruption with limited workaround options, affecting multiple users or a department, but less than 50% of total users at a location. Business functions are impaired but not halted.
examples: Email or file sharing system issues for a team
Critical application error impacting key users

definition: A complete service failure or system outage causing critical impact to business operations, with no workaround available. Affects more than 50% of users or has organization-wide impact.
examples: Core business application down for the majority of users

definition: Standard or routine service requests and non-urgent issues. No immediate business impact or workaround available. Typically includes changes or inquiries.
An issue affecting a single user or a small group, typically involving a non-critical system or one with a reasonable workaround. No significant business impact.
examples: Printer not working for a user
VPN connectivity issues for an individual
